descriptionHtml:
Have you ever seen an khajiit and thoughed: "That isn't the size a cat should be."? Than this is the mod for you. Not only will this immersivy the height of khajiits but also their strength. This will make for harder gameplay for beeing a khajiit. But easier in a fight against one. Note: This doesn't make khajiits look like and act like cats, for khjiits are the next form in evolution for cats. That is a proven fact by me.

This is an simple mod and shouldn't interfere with any other except other height replacers. You should install this mod over that one and you should be fine.

This is a very small and simple mod, but the first one i made and I'm still finding out all the mechanics of the creation kit. If I enjoy creating more mods I will upload more and eventually bigger ones.
author: ModNewb69
